items.name: Columbus Fitness Youth Fitness Program
items.rich-text:
We specialize in creating customized training programs for our 1-on-1, small groups, and teams ranging from 1 to 60 athletes.  Our athletes can train within our Sports Performance Training Programming or privately with a coach to help them reach their athletic potential.  These programs have been proven to meet the training needs of our players and teams of all ages, no matter what their ability or training levels are, our training programs will meet their training needs and goals.

Speed and Agility Training

Our Speed and Agility Training Program is made up of training phases.  Within these training phases an athlete will be taken from someone that isn't sure or confident with what or how they are supposed to move through space to someone that has the mentality and physical capabilities to be successful now.  Phase 1 works on the basics of movement and understanding of what their body is doing and should be doing so they will be as efficient as possible.  Phase 2 takes it to the next level by coaching the athletes how to not only how to accelerate and decelerate properly but also react to a variety of cues given to them by the coach during drills, while making them highly confident mentally and physically with what they can do and therefore pushed 100% during those final drills in training.

Reactive Speed and Strength

Ages 7-13

  • 11/25/22 to 3/30/23
  • Training session times are Tuesdays @ 5:30pm and Thursdays @ 5:30pm
  • Wear tennis shoes
  • Coach to athlete ratio: 1:15
  • Cost: $30 per athlete per session
  • 60 minutes
  • Register Here

Ages 14-18

  • 11/25/22 to 3/30/23
  • Training session times are Mondays @ 4:00pm, Tuesdays at 4:00pm and Thursdays at 4:00pm
  • Coach to athlete ratio: 1:15
  • Cost: $30 per athlete per session
  • 60 minutes
  • Register Here

We focus on adding in sport-specific movements to our training sessions to simulate game like movements.  If you are going to train hard you must train in a responsible way that translates to whatever sport, you will be playing. We will be using a combination of partner drills, reaction drills, and sport specific drills that will challenge you but at the same time preparing you for that next phase.

Speed Conditioning Workouts‍

This New Speed Conditioning Series is designed to help our athletes become not only faster but also increase their endurance so they can perform at their highest-level during sport. Speed is one of the most important traits to have as an athlete in any sport.  No matter the position you play you must be quick enough on your feet to challenge a player on defense or attack while playing offense.  So, this programming will be all about focusing on accelerating pushing driving and a quick foot turnover to become faster on the field.  We will also be looking for the athlete to create a good base of aerobic conditioning they can pull from for when they are in season.

Private or Small Group Training

Is your athlete looking to get bigger, faster, and stronger so they can compete at a higher level during their upcoming season?  If you answered yes, then contact us and we will design build and implement the correct training program so your athlete can compete at their highest level possible!

One of our trainers will sit down and design a program personally for you based on the sport, position you will be playing and what time of year your speed or strength training program will take place compared to when your In Season schedule is. Email us about starting your private training!

Cancellation Policy

A 24 hour notice must be given if you are unable to attend a your session.  If you cancel your session before the 24 hour time frame your session cost will be refunded or you can reschedule your session as soon as possible.  Cancellations within 24 hours are non-refundable.  

Classes offered subject to change through the month.  # of class options may vary based on time of year.

‍

items.name: Columbus Fitness Adult Personal Training
items.rich-text:
We have a Private Training Studio where we can focus on you, the client, without any interruptions from other outside influences while your session is going. However, if we need more space we still have our entire training facility to take advantage of, that way your training program is designed to the fullest and specifically for you.

New Clients Assessment Includes:

  • Free consultation session
  • Comprehensive medical history
  • Functional movement screening
  • Postural Analysis
  • Strength Testing
  • Training program discussion
  • Personal discuss about you

Adult Private Training Sessions Offered:

Private 1-on-1

  • Sessions will take place in our newly renovated Training Room, this allows the client and trainer to be able to privately focus on your needs only during the session.
  • Training in a private space has shown clients have better success in their programs as they are more open to pushing themselves harder without feeling judged and also their knowledge increases because they better understand the what and why's of the program.
  • We build our programs from the bottom up.  Which means we like to look at your overall functionality by running you through a series of exercises to see where the weak points may lie in your body.  Your training program will then be designed to help strengthen those less developed areas while still building upon the strengths that you have.  Which in return will give you a great foundation to continue building off of for your current and future training sessions.

Small Groups (2-4 Clients)

  • Sessions can either take place in our Training Room, Weight Room/Track, or on one of the playing surfaces.
  • These groups are usually put together by the clients because of their close friendships, goals are relatively the same, or their medical/orthopedic issues are closely related.
  • Allows the trainer to seamlessly design a program that will benefit and challenge each client within that small group.

‍

items.name: Columbus Soccer Camps
items.rich-text:
Improve your soccer skills throughout the year with TOCA Soccer Camps!

Designed for players looking to improve their game and soccer IQ, emphasis is placed on fundamentals like passing/receiving, shooting, offense/defense, and team play. Camps of various lengths run throughout spring, summer, and fall with instruction available to players of all abilities, from beginner to advanced.

Highlights

  • Improve your skills and understanding of the game
  • Make friends who also love soccer
  • Stay active in a fun soccer environment

Contact Us

Please fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you to discuss Soccer Camps.

items.name: Columbus Soccer Group Training
items.rich-text:
TOCA Group Training provides a group of up to five similarly-skilled players our tech-enhanced soccer experience at a reduced price. It is the perfect solution for players seeking an affordable and challenging training environment.

Each player in the group receives individualized instruction from TOCA’s professional trainers. Group sessions utilize TOCA’s exclusive soccer tech, including the Touch Trainer and Smart Targets, to help players rapidly develop their touch, technique, and game awareness.

Details

  • Ages: 7-Adult

Highlights

  • Affordable and competitive group training
  • Group 4-5 similar-level athletes
  • Train with TOCA’s proprietary technology

Contact Us

Fill out the form on this page, and our staff will reach out to you to discuss Group Training.

‍

items.name: Columbus Soccer Team Training
items.rich-text:
You work hard to develop quality players capable of playing at the elite levels of the beautiful game. Turbocharge your players’ development with TOCA’s exclusive, tech-enabled training techniques that will rapidly improve their technical skills and game awareness. 

TOCA can also collaborate with you to build custom programming that augments your methodology and helps players reach their potential. Through game-like experiences featuring consistently repeatable touch-building exercises, TOCA’s innovative soccer tech drives improved technical skill, game awareness, and creativity. 

Adding TOCA’s innovative soccer training technology to your player development strategy will give them the cutting edge needed to excel for what comes next. Contact us today to set up a free training session for your club or team.

Contact Us

Please fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you to discuss Team Training.

items.name: Columbus Soccer Individual Training
items.rich-text:
The next game is coming up, and your team needs you to bring it. TOCA training will help you improve quicker than traditional practice regimens, so you’re ready to crush it with the team.

TOCA’s 1-on-1 training takes you through a guided, tech-enhanced soccer experience designed to rapidly improve your skills. The key is TOCA’s proprietary technology, including the Touch Trainer, Smart Targets, Studio Screens, and personalized data tracking, that take your game to the next level.

Overall, you get at least 200 match-quality touches on the ball per TOCA training session - equivalent to a week full of practices! Additionally, you can see your progress during each training session through real-time stats that give you data-driven feedback on your accuracy, efficiency, quickness, and more.

From your first touch and ball control to in-game awareness and decision-making, TOCA’s innovative soccer technology and professional trainers will develop and hone every aspect of your game. Become the player you want to be with TOCA training.

Details

  • Ages: 7-Adult
  • Cost: Starting at $69/session

Highlights

  • Train with TOCA’s innovative technology
  • Dedicated 1-on-1 training session
  • Quickly improve first touch and awareness

Contact Us

Please fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you to discuss Individual Training.

Try TOCA for FREE!

Fill out the form on this page and select Free Kickoff under program. Our center will contact you shortly to book your free kickoff session!

items.name: Columbus Soccer Free Kickoff
items.rich-text:
Sign Up for a FREE Player Assessment!

What You'll Experience in a TOCA Kickoff

  • Tech-Enhanced Training: You will experience the next generation of training with our innovative and cutting-edge technology!
  • Long-Term Goals: Our trainers will leverage your strengths, pinpoint areas for improvement, and develop a plan of action for your long-term goals.
  • Best-In-Class Trainers: Meet our experienced trainers who are lifelong players; many are current or former professional players!

How To Sign Up

Please fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you soon to book your TOCA Kickoff!

items.name: Nashville Soccer Kids' Classes
items.rich-text:
Looking for a way to introduce your child to the beautiful game of soccer? Our kids' classes are the perfect solution!

Our seasons are open enrollment and you can join anytime! Click below to view our schedule(s):

  • Summer 2023

Designed for children starting at 18 months and up to 7 years old, our kids' classes provide a fun, high-energy environment that is perfect for developing your child's motor and social skills. Read about the classes we offer below and see what's best for your child's age and skills.

Kids' Classes (For Ages 18 Months - 7 Years)

Introduce children to soccer through age-appropriate classes.

  • Introduce children to the beautiful game of soccer
  • Teach fundamental skills in fun, age-appropriate classes
  • Build motor skills using high-energy activities

Our seasons are open enrollment. You can join anytime, and the cost will be prorated. Sign up below!

‍

Kids' Advanced Classes (For Ages 6-7 Years)

For more experienced players, our advanced classes focus on more technical skills such as game awareness and decision-making.

  • Develop player skills with advanced programming
  • Focus on individual player development
  • Enhance game awareness and decision-making skills

Our seasons are open enrollment. You can join anytime, and the cost will be prorated. Sign up below!

‍

Kids' League

For those looking for game opportunities, our kids' league provides players a chance to compete against other players in their age group.

  • Offered only in Winter and Summer seasons
  • Allows players to compete in a fun and safe environment
  • Teaches team tactics and rules of the game

Our seasons are open enrollment. You can join anytime, and the cost will be prorated. Sign up below!

‍

Private or Small Group Lessons

Private or small group lessons can be purchased for $50 per 1 session or save 10% when you purchase a 10 pack. Each session lasts 50-minutes.

  • Private lessons for individual
  • 1:1 time with our kids' coach
  • minimum purchase, 4 sessions per purchase

‍

Call TOCA Nashville or book online to schedule your private lessons!

Schedule availability:

M-F 8am-4pm

Sat 8am-11am

‍

‍

Try A FREE Class

We offer a FREE class for all new guests! Please fill out the form on this page and select Kids' Classes under the program drop-down

items.name: Nashville About TOCA Football
items.rich-text:
Next Generation Soccer Training

TOCA offers technology-enhanced soccer training designed to produce rapid skill improvement and develop well-rounded players. The key is TOCA’s proprietary technology, including the Touch Trainer, Smart Targets, Studio Screens, and personalized data tracking, that take your game to the next level.

Overall, you get at least 200 match-quality touches on the ball per TOCA training session - equivalent to a week full of practices! Additionally, you can see your progress during each training session through real-time stats that give you data-driven feedback on your accuracy, efficiency, quickness, and more.

TOCA’s exclusive training tools will fine-tune your touch, improve your skills and sharpen your in-game awareness and decision-making. Become the player you want to be with TOCA

Make Every Touch Count

Your first touch on a ball is one of the most important skills to develop. Possessing a good first touch can be the difference between creating a scoring opportunity for your team or gifting one to your opponent.

TOCA’s Touch Trainer is a revolutionary tool that develops your first touch by delivering passes at various speeds and trajectories. Compared to other training programs that produce fewer touches for players, the Touch Trainer is guaranteed to serve a minimum of 200 match-quality touches every training session.

Key to providing you with so many quality touches is TOCA’s innovative “small ball” methodology. Lighter and smaller than a size 5 ball, the TOCA ball reduces physical stress on your body. Our “small ball” also improves your accuracy by honing your ability to target the optimal strike zones on a regulation ball.

Train Smart

Smart Targets light up, acting as a teammate, allowing for game-like scenarios that improve your situational awareness and condition you to make quick, smart decisions.

Track Progress in Real-Time

Your real-time performance data is displayed on a studio screen - tracking improvements and inspiring you to find your best.

Join the TOCA Community

From our friendly front desk staff to our best-in-class trainers, TOCA is dedicated to helping you become the player you want to be.

Try A FREE Kickoff Session

Click the links below to learn more about our different training programs below:

  • Individual Training
  • Elite Training
  • Group Training
  • Team Training
  • Soccer Camps
  • Strikers

Want To Try a FREE Session?

Fill out the form on this page and select Free Kickoff under program. Our center will contact you shortly to book your free kickoff session!

items.rich-text:

  • Dates: Fridays 7:30-8:30PM

  • No RSVP needed. Drop-ins welcome.
  • First Come, First Serve
  • Limit of 25 Players

Highlights

  • Pick-up style games open to all skill levels
  • Have fun with friends or make new ones who also love the beautiful game

items.name: Costa Mesa Soccer Elite Training
items.rich-text:
Got your sights set on playing at a collegiate level? Want to play on the same pitch as the pros? As the competition gets tougher, give yourself a winning edge like pros Jane Campbell (Houston Dash goalkeeper) or Gyasi Zardes (Colorado Rapids striker) who stay sharp by training at TOCA.

TOCA’s elite training takes you through a guided, tech-enhanced soccer experience designed to rapidly improve your skills. The key is TOCA’s proprietary technology, including the Touch Trainer, Smart Targets, Studio Screens, and personalized data tracking, that take your game to the next level.

Overall, you get at least 200 match-quality touches on the ball per TOCA training session - equivalent to a week full of practices! Additionally, you can see your progress during each training session through real-time stats that give you data-driven feedback on your accuracy, efficiency, quickness, and more. 

From your first touch and ball control to in-game awareness and decision-making, TOCA’s innovative soccer technology and professional trainers will develop and sharpen every aspect of your game. Become the player you want to be with TOCA training.

Details

  • Ages: 7+
  • Cost: Members: $65. Non-members: $90.

Highlights

  • Train with TOCA’s innovative technology
  • Dedicated 1-on-1 training session
  • Quickly improve first touch and awareness

Try A FREE Kickoff Session

Want to try a FREE session first? Register for a Free Kickoff Session!

items.rich-text:
The next game is coming up, and your team needs you to bring it. TOCA training will help you improve quicker than traditional practice regimens, so you’re ready to crush it with the team.

From your first touch and ball control to in-game awareness and decision-making, TOCA’s innovative soccer technology and professional trainers will develop and hone every aspect of your game. Become the player you want to be with TOCA training.

Details

  • Ages: 7-Adult
  • Cost: Starting at $69/session

Highlights

items.name: Mansfield Soccer Team Training
items.rich-text:
You work hard to develop quality players capable of playing at the elite levels of the beautiful game. Turbocharge your players’ development with TOCA’s exclusive, tech-enabled training techniques that will rapidly improve their technical skills and game awareness. 

TOCA can also collaborate with you to build custom programming that augments your methodology and helps players reach their potential. Through game-like experiences featuring consistently repeatable touch-building exercises, TOCA’s innovative soccer tech drives improved technical skill, game awareness, and creativity. 

Adding TOCA’s innovative soccer training technology to your player development strategy will give them the cutting edge needed to excel for what comes next. Contact us today to set up a free training session for your club or team.

Contact Us

Please fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you to discuss Team Training.

items.name: Mansfield Soccer About TOCA Football
items.rich-text:
Next Generation Soccer Training

TOCA offers technology-enhanced soccer training designed to produce rapid skill improvement and develop well-rounded players. The key is TOCA’s proprietary technology, including the Touch Trainer, Smart Targets, Studio Screens, and personalized data tracking, that take your game to the next level.

Overall, you get at least 200 match-quality touches on the ball per TOCA training session - equivalent to a week full of practices! Additionally, you can see your progress during each training session through real-time stats that give you data-driven feedback on your accuracy, efficiency, quickness, and more.

TOCA’s exclusive training tools will fine-tune your touch, improve your skills and sharpen your in-game awareness and decision-making. Become the player you want to be with TOCA

Make Every Touch Count

Your first touch on a ball is one of the most important skills to develop. Possessing a good first touch can be the difference between creating a scoring opportunity for your team or gifting one to your opponent.

TOCA’s Touch Trainer is a revolutionary tool that develops your first touch by delivering passes at various speeds and trajectories. Compared to other training programs that produce fewer touches for players, the Touch Trainer is guaranteed to serve a minimum of 200 match-quality touches every training session.

Key to providing you with so many quality touches is TOCA’s innovative “small ball” methodology. Lighter and smaller than a size 5 ball, the TOCA ball reduces physical stress on your body. Our “small ball” also improves your accuracy by honing your ability to target the optimal strike zones on a regulation ball.

Train Smart

Smart Targets light up, acting as a teammate, allowing for game-like scenarios that improve your situational awareness and condition you to make quick, smart decisions.

Track Progress in Real-Time

Your real-time performance data is displayed on a studio screen - tracking improvements and inspiring you to find your best.

Join the TOCA Community

From our friendly front desk staff to our best-in-class trainers, TOCA is dedicated to helping you become the player you want to be.

Try A FREE Kickoff Session

Fill out this form to try a FREE kickoff session!

  • Free 50-minute training session
  • Get 200 touches with the Touch Trainer
  • Discuss your goals with our trainers

items.name: Mansfield Birthday Parties
items.rich-text:
Celebrate your little soccer lover with the ultimate beautiful game birthday party! TOCA birthday packages include playtime in our soccer studios, exclusive use of our party area, and a dedicated party coach.

Highlights

  • Celebrate the soccer lover in your life 
  • Enjoy exclusive use of soccer studios and party area
  • Make lasting birthday memories with family and friends

Contact Us

Please fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you to discuss Birthday Parties.

items.name: Mansfield Venue Rental
items.rich-text:
Whatever your next special event, TOCA has you covered! Whether it's a holiday party, bachelor/bachelorette party, or any kind of corporate event, TOCA has versatile event spaces, catering options, and soccer studios that will make your time with us a blast!

Contact Us

Fill out the form on this page, and our center will contact you to discuss Venue Rental.

items.name: Mansfield D-BAT
items.rich-text:
D-BAT provides a quality teaching environment that enhances baseball and softball experience for players at all levels–from little league to the pros.

Premiere Baseball and Softball Training

For over 20 years, D-BAT has impacted the playing careers of thousands of ballplayers. As a young player, there’s nothing worse than striking out. At D-BAT, our mission is to provide a quality teaching environment and top-notch instruction to enhance the baseball experience for players at all levels.

Here Every Step of the Way

From 6-year-olds to top MLB prospects, thousands of athletes have used our programs to take their game to the next level. We're here every step of the way to help you reach your goals.

Learn More

To learn more about D-BAT Mansfield, visit www.dbatmansfield.com

items.name: Costa Mesa Soccer Adult Open Play
items.rich-text:
Drop by TOCA and join one of our Open Play soccer games for a night of fun footy competition! Gather your coworkers for an evening of team-building, round up some friends from a quick scrimmage, or just drop by to meet new people.

Details

  • Ages: 18+
  • Dates: Wednesdays and Thursdays 8-10PM
  • Price: $10 Per Person (Pay In Person)
  • No RSVP needed. Drop-ins welcome.
  • First Come, First Serve
  • Limit of 25 Players

Highlights

  • Pick-up style games open to all skill levels
  • Have fun with friends or make new ones who also love the beautiful game

‍

items.short-description: Group training for up to 5 players incorporating our tech-driven methods.
items.name: Group Training
items.body-description: TOCA Group Training delivers the same high-quality technology-driven soccer training TOCA is known for, but in a small group environment. Grow together with 2-5 other players just like you!

items.short-description: Introductory soccer curriculum for kids ages 18 months to 7 years.
items.name: Strikers
items.body-description: For ages 18 months to 7 years, TOCA Strikers is designed to introduce your little one to the beautiful game. We tailor our classes to be age-appropriate, engaging, and fun. Our programs help build confidence at an early age, so your kids can excel on and off the pitch.

items.short-description: Specialized multisports programs for kids ages 12 months to 12 years.
items.name: Kids In Sports
items.body-description:
When kids play sports, they develop gross and fine motor skills, they learn how to work together, follow directions and socialize with others. Kids In Sports promotes the idea that athletics, when taught correctly, can improve a child’s overall development and provide lasting benefits that go beyond the game.

Developed by educators, Kids In Sports is a specialized sports program for children ages 1 to 8 years old and instructs children in multi-sport classes focusing on: Baseball, Basketball, Flag Football, Floor Hockey, Lacrosse, Soccer and Volleyball.

Our customized multi-sports program has been designed to equip children with greater life skills, helping them find early success so that they can grow up happy, healthy, confident and more prepared for the future ahead.

items.short-description: Technology-enabled training customized to enhance your game.
items.name: Training
items.body-description: Welcome to the first of its kind, next generation soccer training. At TOCA, our technology enabled training sessions, led by world-class coaches, drive rapid improvements and results that cannot be matched anywhere else. Our techniques develop well-rounded players through quality repetitions and game-like simulations utilizing our latest patented technology.

showcase-images-4.alt: girl in a soccer studio training
smart target is the next generation of soccer training
toca trainer looking at the soccer technology including the touch trainer
young girl training for soccer in a toca football studio

items.short-description: Friendly competition in our recreational soccer league for adults.
items.name: Adult Leagues
items.body-description: Community meets soccer at TOCA Leagues. From seasoned pros who want to push themselves, to players who simply want to enjoy friendly competition, TOCA Football has a league for everyone! Build a team with your friends or call your local center and let us help you find the perfect team!
